structure.unit: PAYMENT, COLLECTION, AND REFUND OF TAXES

law.history: Repealed 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 10, sec. 71, effective January 1, 2010. -- Repealed and reenacted 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. V, sec. 346, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 384, sec. 278, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 20, sec. 6, effective January 2, 1978. -- Amended 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 186, Art. I, sec. 26. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 932, 4147.
